Articles.Content:
No offense, but do you mind if I translate that a bit, for posterity's sake?

It seems like while he enjoys the mod, the textures are too high and would possibly like a lower res texture, perhaps more stock alike. His game crashes even with few mods.

in a release-version yes, but this is still in development and my pngs a very do-it-your-self-shrink-friendly.

Memory-usage will be also more reduced with more texture-sharing and more but smaller texturefiles.

( this forum is horrible slow today)

Start with high detail and trim back when it's time to trim back. For now the core functionality of parts should be the focus.

There is a mod for reducing textures. It seems to work well for some people. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-22-Release-1-Active-Memory-Reduction-Mod
I cannot figure out how to adjust the ramps. I have KAS and Firespitter installed, but still don't get a menu to adjust the ramps like the YouTube video showes. HELP!
Love it Great work !

HELP!

Please give me the part-name of the one you call "ramp"

updates will take time, my mousehand is not in the best condition, cause i tried to play volleyball after 15 years of absence ... ;-)

Please give me the part-name of the one you call "ramp"

updates will take time, my mousehand is not in the best condition, cause i tried to play volleyball after 15 years of absence ... ;-)

Sorry, ramp was the wrong word to use. I am trying to get the tubes to animate and move. Every time I place down a tube (nt-100/10/30 etc) I only get grab and attach as menu options. There are no options to unfold the tube, set the legs, turn said tube, etc. Hope this explains the problem a bit more.

The legs are a different piece entirely. I think it's about the same size as the "5". Rotating is done with hotkeys. b and n, I think (same as KAS). If all you see is grab and attach with the 100/50/10/etc, then everything is working properly.

The legs are a different piece entirely. I think it's about the same size as the "5". Rotating is done with hotkeys. b and n, I think (same as KAS). If all you see is grab and attach with the 100/50/10/etc, then everything is working properly.

Thanks for clearing that up. I was getting the old tube system and the new one confused. Everything works as it should!
supp me please

i was experiencing the same problems wit kerbals getting stuck that everyone seems to be having, so i decided to change the rescale factor to 1.2, making the tubes a bit bigger. I tried it out, and it turned out that although the kerbals still got stuck, i was able to easily recover them with the RCS pack everytime.

The only problem was that kerbals couldn't seem to enter tubes that had been placed while on EVA, and that the nodes for building tubes in the VAB where a bit behind where they should be.

Yo dawg! I heard you like tubes, so I put tube-making tubes in your tubes o tube tubes on your tube so you can tube while you tube!

-pant- That was hard...
Just wondering if you are going to add any sort of large hub or dome? It would make it so much easier to make a nice bio dome on Duna!
WOW been waiting for something like this to come along awesome

How is the lag? mostly parts like this lag allot.

And are there also low ress texture versions? to beat the lag? i have a pretty heavy machine,but these kind of structures tend to make the game lag.

Would be nice that it used something like part welding,reducing the part count.

But apart from that,it looks good,cant wait to use it in the game when im back home.
Use this its prity good at freeing up memory http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005
so did this survive .23 because i haven't checked
I don't know about kerbal placed pieces, but VAB still works and career still has the parts.
is this still alive because i love this mod

is this still alive because i love this mod

I don't think it's still alive, but it looks like the license allows someone else to continue this mod.
It's back to back holiday time. Vacation time for many. Heck, some Europeans take a month off. Give it time.

I don't think it's still alive, but it looks like the license allows someone else to continue this mod.

i hope this is still alive because onkelsiebdruck is really talented especially with these tubes

wait...you can walk inside dat?

edit: after watching your videos.I'm speechless. THIS IS SO F*********** AMAZING! The only mod I will really enjoy and use everytime!

edit2: Looks like the habitation module (or what's that called) just falls into the runway.I also can't find the extendable part (maybe that's not included yet)

Can't wait for full version!

Edited January 7, 2014 by JiWint

wonderfull! Nice job! Can you make a TAC life support compatibility, airlock and breathable interior? (with food storage module, food production module, air production and recycling module, water module, and mining (on pole of duna for exemple) ? It will be multiwonderfull!!!!

wait...you can walk inside dat?

edit: after watching your videos.I'm speechless. THIS IS SO F*********** AMAZING! The only mod I will really enjoy and use everytime!

Can't wait for full version!

If you don't have a pod attached a lot of the parts are just considered debris and KSP planetary surfaces eat debris.
